backend/main.mo: Defines data types and in-memory maps for tasks, overtime, user profiles, dental avatars, and legacy decision entries. Initializes default avatars and tracks IDs for task and overtime entries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata mapping frontend files, components, and test IDs to two task‑reset related features. Serves as a structured record for feature coverage and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries of numerous frontend components, hooks, and pages for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables using OKLCH values, applying global background and border styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entrypoint with root mounting div and script loading the React main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication initialization and conditional rendering of login or authenticated flows with theme and i18n providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Controls post-login flow by loading user role and profile, showing role choice or onboarding when needed, and rendering the main app shell otherwise.
frontend/src/components/auth/FirstManage: Empty file placeholder for a manager confirmation dialog component.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login UI allowing selection of assistant or manager role with optional manager token, storing selections before triggering Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleChoiceS: Role selection UI letting users choose assistant or manager, handling persisted choices and token entry before calling role selection mutations.
frontend/src/components/avatars/avatarMa: Empty file placeholder for avatar manifest data.
frontend/src/components/avatars/AvatarPi: Fetches and displays selectable dental avatars with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/avatars/DentalAv: Renders a dental avatar SVG or a fallback if invalid or loading fails, using data URI encoding.
frontend/src/components/avatars/Generate: Generates a pastel-colored SVG avatar displaying up to three initials.
frontend/src/components/avatars/ProfileA: Chooses between uploaded profile photo, dental avatar, or generated initials avatar based on availability.
frontend/src/components/badges/badges.ts: Defines badge metadata including IDs, translation keys, and icons.
frontend/src/components/badges/BadgeShel: Side sheet showing all badges with earned state indicators using translations.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryErro: Full-page error fallback showing an error message and retry button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Application header with logo, theme and language controls, profile menu, badge and settings panels, and logout handling.
Main app layout with header, tab navigation, conditional manager tab, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/LanguageS: Dropdown selector to change application language among predefined options.
frontend/src/components/layout/ThemeTogg: Button toggling between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskAudi: Displays a table of completed tasks with user info, comments, and photo indicators using profile lookup.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskComp: Generates a bar chart summarizing task completions per user based on completed task data.
frontend/src/components/manager/UserPick: Renders a dropdown for selecting a user, showing avatars and usernames, and returns the chosen Principal.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TabNa: Simple tab navigation bar that switches active tabs via callback.
frontend/src/components/overtime/Overtim: Form for adding or deducting overtime minutes with date validation and submission handling.
Shows a sorted list of overtime entries with date formatting and visual indicators for additions or deductions.
Calculates and displays total overtime minutes and a formatted composite of days, hours, and minutes.
frontend/src/components/profile/PrivacyP: Panel for exporting cached user data or clearing local profile data with confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileO: Modal for initial profile setup allowing username, initials, avatar selection, and photo upload with progress tracking and saving.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Photo upload field with validation, preview, remove option, and upload progress display.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Profile settings sheet enabling editing of username, initials, avatar mode, photo upload/removal, and privacy panel access.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CompleteTa: Dialog for completing a task with optional comment and before/after photo uploads before submitting.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CreateTask: Dialog for creating a new task by entering title, description, and selecting task type.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskCard.t: Displays a task with type badges, completion state, and optionally opens a dialog to mark it completed.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskList.t: Sorts and displays tasks by completion and priority, showing a message if none exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the caller’s user role and admin status from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useBadges.ts: Computes earned badges from overtime and task completion data.
frontend/src/hooks/useDentalAvatars.ts: Fetches dental avatars from the backend and provides a lookup helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useI18n.ts: Returns the i18n context or throws if missing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerOvertime.ts: Fetches a user's overtime entries and formats them for export.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerTasks.ts: Provides a disabled-by-default query to export task data.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotify.ts: Provides toast helpers and standardized error handling based on message patterns.
frontend/src/hooks/useOvertime.ts: Fetches caller overtime entries and provides mutation to create new entries with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that feature-specific hooks live elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleSelection.ts: Provides mutations for selecting assistant or manager roles and updates role-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Manages task fetching and mutations for creating, completing, and resetting tasks with optimistic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches, updates, and manages user profile data including photo upload/removal.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides a React context for language selection and translation lookup with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and a large object containing translation strings for the UI.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode colors, and global base styles including animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerDashbo: Renders the manager dashboard with tabs for overtime management and statistics.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerOverti: Allows managers to view user overtime entries, export data to CSV, and select users to inspect.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerStatsP: Shows task statistics, audit logs, and provides CSV export of task data using actor calls.
frontend/src/pages/OvertimePage.tsx: Displays overtime form, totals, and history, fetching user overtime entries and showing a loading state.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Shows the task list with creation dialog, resets recurring tasks on initial load, and handles loading state.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Converts arrays of objects to a CSV file and triggers a client-side download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL and session-stored parameters, persisting them, and manipulating hash params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color system, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata detailing app requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and feature definitions for the FitGebit Team Tracker ICP app.
